name: tirona-electron-wrapper
description: Electron wrapper for Tirona Next.js application
author: Tirona

scripts.dev: npm run build && cross-env APP_ENV=dev electron .
scripts.dev:electron: npm run build && cross-env APP_ENV=dev electron .
scripts.start: npm run build && cross-env APP_ENV=prod electron .
scripts.start:prod: npm run build && cross-env APP_ENV=prod electron .
scripts.package: npm run build && cross-env APP_ENV=prod electron-builder --win --mac
scripts.package:win: npm run build && cross-env APP_ENV=prod electron-builder --win
scripts.package:mac: npm run build && cross-env APP_ENV=prod electron-builder --mac
scripts.build:electron: npm run build && cross-env APP_ENV=prod electron-builder
scripts.test:tts: npm run build && cross-env TTS_TEST=true electron .
